testString: CEF:0|security|threatmanager|1.0|100|detected a \| in message|10|src=10.0.0.1 act=blocked a | dst=1.1.1.1
description: If a pipe (|) is used in the header, it has to be escaped with a backslash (\). But note that pipes in the extension do not need escaping.
name: detected a | in message
